thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com
thread.title: Madison L.

author: Madison L.
title: Madison L.
text: As someone who has worn contact lenses since middle school, I dread when it comes time to buy contacts because of how expensive they are! Until I found Opti Contacts, I was paying $50-$60 for ONE small box. When I placed my order, I chose to e-mail in my prescription and within a few days, my contacts were delivered! I was so excited to be able to purchase something so viral to me at such an affordable price; and I will definitely be using Opti Contacts from now on due to their excellent variety of contact lenses, incredible prices, and fast delivery!
